Text: N-vinylpyrrolidone is a reactive, unsaturated comonomer used in a variety of applications
NVP is utilized as a reactive diluent for radiation curing in UV adhesives. It provides excellent wetting and adhesion on plastics.
NVP is utilized as a reactive diluent for radiation curing in UV coatings. It provides excellent wetting and adhesion on plastics.
NVP is utilized as a reactive diluent for radiation curing in UV inks. It provides excellent wetting and adhesion on plastics.
NVP is the main comonomer in the manufacture of polyvinylpyrrolidones (PVP) with uses in applications such as oil-field, cosmetics, medical and adhesives.
